item.title: 3 Under-the-Radar Stocks Set to Benefit From Oracle’s Boom
item.description: Oracle just provided an outlook on its artificial intelligence-driven business that shocked markets in a great way. These three stocks can benefit.

item.title: Lululemon’s Sell-Off Looks Overdone: A Contrarian Case
item.description: Lululemon has been continuously dumped by investors, but there's a sense the worst-case scenario is priced in and the risk/reward setup is attractive.

item.title: How Bath & Body Works Is a Perfect Example of a Value Stock
item.description: Bath & Body Works represents a classic example of a value investment, all the way from its financial profile to its discounted valuation today.

item.title: Why Opendoor Stock Is Soaring—and May Just Be Starting

item.title: 3 Dividend Stocks Raising Payouts in 2025 — With More to Come
item.description: While Verizon and JCI just boosted their dividend, investors should gear up for the second biggest name in AI semiconductors to do the same in 2025.
